bio.text: I am a programmer and I like soup. It is delicious and I eat it most ever day. Sometimes I eat mushroom soup. Sometimes I eat corn chowder. Other times I eat bean kale soup which is very good.

projects.title: Quiz
projects.text: Quiz is an easy to use trivia app, making it easy to deploy multiple choice trivia games. Quizzes are stored in JSON files and can be...

gallery.caption: The landing page displaying a searchable listing of available quizzes.

projects.title: Apple Project
projects.summary: Apples can be green or red???
projects.text: Apples are delicious. I eat thim with peanut butter.

projects.title: Tofu for Days
projects.text: Tofu is kind of heard to get right. It's important to press the water out of it first.

links.title: Bean Kale Soup Recipe
links.summary: I use carrots instead of tomatoes
links.text: Check out this recipe for a delicious hearty soup. I use thinly sliced carrots instead of tomatoes and always make a double batch. Don't skimp on the garlic!

links.title: The Fetch API
links.summary: Using fetch to retrieve resources. Read up on async / await too...
links.text: For my quiz app project I wanted to make the page a container for various quizzes so needed to find an easy way to load the pertinent data from an external resource. Read up on the fetch API as an easy way to retrieve external files.
